translations.chinese: 故大夫以上賜爵各一級，其七大夫以上，皆令食邑，非七大夫以下，皆復其身及戶，勿事。」
translations.english: Former grand masters and above are granted one rank each. Those seventh rank grand master and above are all given fiefs. Those below seventh rank grand master are exempted from service for themselves and their households."

translations.chinese: 又曰：「七大夫、公乘以上，皆高爵也。
translations.english: He also said: "Seventh rank grand master and public chariot driver and above are all high ranks.

translations.chinese: 諸 侯子及從軍歸者，甚多高爵，吾數詔吏先與田宅，及所當求於吏者，亟與。
translations.english: Feudal lords' sons and those returning from military service have many high ranks. I have repeatedly commanded officials to first give them fields and homes, and whatever they should seek from officials, give it quickly.

translations.chinese: 爵或人君，上所尊禮，久立吏前，曾不為決，甚亡謂也。
translations.english: Ranks are from the ruler, honored by superiors. Standing long before officials, not deciding, is very improper.

translations.chinese: 異日秦民爵公大夫以上，令丞與 亢禮。
translations.english: In former days Qin people with ranks of public official and grand master and above, the county magistrate and assistant treated them with equal ceremony.
